page.title: 02A boy's view of Gannochy
page.content: There aren't many cars or other traffic so there is plenty of space to play.There's a lovely pond with an Island in the middle and lots of ducks. There are many children in the area so there's always lots of people to play with. There's lots of space for cycling and playing football and there is a tennis club for energetic youngsters and a bowling club for older people. Most of the houses have big gardens with hedges or walls around them so there's lots of privacy. You would think you were in the country there's fields and trees and even a burn but it is very convient because it is so near the town. Over all Gannochy is a very good place to live for adults and children alike.
